TAG_DESCRIPTION: With this command you can assign a tag onto a card. Tags are a useful feature to categorize and group multiple cards that fit your own criteria. Use the command "{{prefix}}tagcreate" to create tags
NO_TAGS_CREATED: {{author}} You don't have any tags yet. Use the command `{{prefix}}tc <TagName> <Emoji>` to create one
TAG_NOT_FOUND: {{author}} You don't have any tag with the name `{{arg}}`
NO_CARDS_CLAIMED: {{author}} You do not have any cards in your collection yet
INVALID_CARD_CODE: {{author}} The card code you provided is either invalid or not in your collection
INVALID_MULTIPLE_CARD_CODES:
{{author}} The following card codes are either invalid or not in your collection:
{{arg}}
